Bought it to use with my Raspberry Pi 2. It got detected out of the box with Raspbian and Ubuntu MATE. But, the device has really low range! Shows no signal in my next room, which is just 10 feet away! Connection was dropping off all the time. Buy this if you have to use it on a device in the same room as your WiFi router is kept. Really disappointed.

worst product of all time. not able to install by itself like other devices. Not even when installed by driver setup which is given with the product.
Request was accepted for its return but such a long process to return 250/- product and some amount also was to be deducted.
who will take such a pain.

column9: Worst device with life expectancy of 10 days
column10: The device is of very poor quality. It stopped working in 10 days. The product needs to be returned within 10 days to be eligible for return instead of usual 30 days. So I am stuck with this and its completely useless. Please dont buy and waste your money otherwise be prepared to throw it in garbage bin.

Sucksss with rpi's, don't expect range to be much as 2m away from the router, showed only 2 bars on my raspberry pi, but yeah works out of the box and serves the purpose.. Seller veedee is decent enough to call up after sales.. Plus one star for that

column9: Worst product, Please don't buy it

This adapter has very poor signal reception. I had to move my router very close to it (3 meters distance) and in the same room. I was using it for my media center PC. After around 10 switch ON/OFF cycle it failed. Its completely dead and I don't know how to claim warranty.

Its good...But once connected to the PC the network is very slow. Speed of the internet should be 157 mbps as written on the box.But the speed we are getting is 0.44 mbps.It is not all good and not at all compatible.Kindly replace the same or refund the amt.Thanks.

column9: Device is good but it does not give good connectivity

Device is good but it does not give good connectivity.
My connection is 5mbps, i get same when i do test on my laptop using wifi, but when i use this device it gives my only 0.6mbps speedtest result.

I would not recommend to buy this.
No technical support provided had to call multiple number of times to get the settings configured on my pc
not compatible. already requested for return the same. not communicated so far. no refund has been given.
